attributes.additional_details: The government is meant to be influencing people to do the right thing and insure legally instead the insurance prices are sky high, due to the increase in insurance prices people can’t even insure their cars. You wonder why people drive on fake certificates and mids it’s because of the insurance prices
attributes.background:
The cost of living is atrocious and the cost of insurance is even worse 
The price of insurance needs to be lowered

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
